document_data.name: Tiphera's mausoleum
document_data.mainbody: '''Tiphera's mausoleum''' was a lavish tomb in the [[Raurinshield]] mountains where [[Tiphera tir-Yseldre]] had been interred.
document_data.Location: The mausoleum stood at the site of Tiphera's victory against the [[blue dragon]] [[Sturykkazynarr]].
document_data.Activities: A three-day rite at the location could be used to awaken the final set of powers of the ''Wyrmbane Helm''.
document_data.History: The mausoleum was built on the orders of King [[Andizen]] after the death of Tiphera. She was interred there with her helm, the ''[[Wyrmbane Helm]]'', but it disappeared soon after.
document_data.Inhabitants: The mausoleum had become infested by powerful [[undead]] by the year {{yearlink|1372}}.
